Articles.Content:
when i just open any game (New or used) i try to click and open a building (Any), it shows i can open it but when i click ether the game freezes or it is in a really long load that never ends.

Please anyone out there, your my only hope!

Edited April 29, 2015 by Master Tao

Welcome to the forums!

First, could you try reinstalling the game from a fresh download or "Verify the Integrity of Game Cache" through Steam?

If you can reproduce it with a new install, please upload a copy of your output_log.txt. Read the [thread=92230]Stock Support and Bug Reporting Guide[/thread] if you're not sure how to locate it.
We need the game logs, this could be caused by anything, please see the support stickies
I'm still new at this wat is a "support stickie"

DarkPhantom,

You can find the support sticky here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92230-%21%21%21-PLEASE-READ-BEFORE-POSTING-%21%21%21-Stock-Support-Bug-Reporting-Guide

Your game log should be located in KSP_Install/KSP_Data/output_log.txt. The sticky will explain how to get there and good places to upload the file.

Welcome to the forum (ish)

Cheers,

~Claw
